channel.title: Layer5 Events
channel.description: Expect more from your infrastructure. Cloud native, open source software for your cloud native infrastructure and applications. Allowing developers to focus on business logic, not infrastructure concerns. Empowering operators to confidently run modern infrastructure.

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon, North America 2025
item.description: Kubernetes Ontologies and Multiplayer GitOps with Meshery

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon, Europe 2025
item.description: Kubernetes Ontologies and Multiplayer GitOps with Meshery

item.description: CNCF Tag Network and Service mesh Working Group Deep Dive

item.title: Hacktoberfest Prep 2024: Extending Meshery Models
item.description: Prepare for Hacktoberfest with Layer5 MeshMates and Maintainers. Join seasoned open source maintainers, hack through easy issues, and grow your skills. Discover Newcomers resources and explore the Layer5 Community Handbook.

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Open Source Summit + AI_dev Hong Kong, China
KubeCon + CloudNativeCon EU Paris, France 2024
item.description: CNCF Tag Network and Service mesh Working Group Deep Dive

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America Chicago 2023
item.description: The Cloud Native Computing Foundation’s flagship conference gathers adopters and technologists from leading open source and cloud native communities.

item.title: Hacktoberfest Prep 2023: Extending Docker Desktop
item.description: Prepare for Hacktoberfest with Layer5 MeshMates and Maintainers. Join seasoned open source maintainers, hack through easy issues, and grow your skills. Discover Newcomers Resources and explore the Layer5 Community Handbook.

item.title: Hacktoberfest Prep 2023: Easing into CNCF Open Source Projects
item.description: Prepare for Hacktoberfest with Layer5 MeshMates and Maintainers. Join seasoned open source maintainers, hack through easy issues, and grow your skills. Discover Newcomers Resources and explore the Layer5 Community Handbook.

item.title: IstioCon Virtual 2023
item.description: Embark on a collaborative journey with Layer5 and Intel at IstioCon! Join us on September 25th to 26th for Multiplayer Istio: Collaborative WASM Plugins.

item.title: Kickstarting Open Source with Layer5
item.description: Gain valuable insights into Layer5's projects as this dynamic duo guides you through the world of open source.

item.title: KCD Chennai 2023
item.description: Discover how Meshery transforms orchestration across multiple environments, leveraging GitOps principles and fostering multi-user collaboration. Join us for an insightful session at KCD Chennai 2023!

item.title: May Maintainer's Circle 2023
item.description: Join Lee Calcote and Nate Waddington in the upcoming Maintainer’s Circle special session and explore their insights, and experiences from their mentorship journey within the CNCF.

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNativeCon EU Amsterdam 2023
item.description: CNCF Tag Network and Service mesh Working Group Deep Dive

item.title: KubeCon + CloudNative North America 2022
item.description: Explore the world of Meshery and Service Mesh Performance at the upcoming CNCF Project Office Hours.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2022: Docker Extensions Show-n-Tell
item.description: Join Layer5 in person at the Docker Community Meetup in Bengaluru as we unveil the Meshery Docker Extension and demonstrate how it revolutionizes the management of cloud-native applications. Explore the Meshery Docker Extension with a deep dive into its basic concepts, architecture, and components

item.title: Hacktoberfest Prep: Easing into CNCF Open Source Projects
item.description: Gear up for Hacktoberfest! Discover the impact of small changes on a project's scalability. Join Layer5's MeshMates and Maintainers to contribute effortlessly to CNCF projects.

item.title: DevOps and Docker Live Show
item.description: Join Bret Fisher, Lee Calcote from Layer5, and Nic Jackson from HashiCorp on the DevOps and Docker Live Show. Witness the Meshery Docker Extension in action as it transforms Docker Desktop into a robust cloud-native infrastructure development environment.
